name: 蔡一豪
objective:
本課程涵蓋各類馬達的基本原理與實務應用。課程內容包括磁路分析、頓轉扭矩的產生與抑制方法，以及各類馬達的結構與運作原理。此外，課程還介紹了電機 - 機械能量轉換與馬達驅動控制技術，並透過實際案例進行練習與應用。且探討多種馬達類型，包括直流有刷馬達、步進馬達、直流無刷馬達、感應馬達、磁阻馬達以及線性馬達。

This course covers the fundamental principles and practical applications of various motors. The topics include magnetic circuit analysis, the generation and suppression of cogging torque, and the structure and operating principles of different types of motors. Additionally, the course introduces electromechanical energy conversion and motor drive control techniques, with practical exercises and applications through real-world examples. It also explores various motor types, including DC brushed motors, stepper motors, brushless DC motors, induction motors, reluctance motors, and linear motors.
